verses.text: If someone's offering is a sacrifice of fellowship offering, and he offers it from the herd, whether male or female, he must present it without defect before Yahweh.
verses.comment: The term 'fellowship offering' translates the Hebrew 'shelem', also known as 'peace offering' or 'offering of wellbeing'. 'Yahweh' used for the LORD (Hebrew YHWH).

verses.text: He shall lay his hand on the head of his offering and slaughter it at the entrance of the Tent of Meeting. Then Aaron's sons, the priests, shall splash the blood all around on the altar.
verses.comment: This matches the sacrificial ritual described for other offerings. 'Splash' translates a Hebrew word meaning 'throw'.

verses.text: From the fellowship offering, he shall present as an offering made by fire to Yahweh the fat covering the inner organs and all the fat attached to the organs.
verses.comment: 'Fat covering the inner organs' refers to the fatty membrane and attached fat parts. 'Offering made by fire' = 'offering by fire' tradition.

verses.text: the two kidneys with the fat that is on them at the loins, and the long lobe of the liver, which he shall remove with the kidneys.
verses.comment: Literal rendering of Hebrew sacrificial anatomy terminology.

verses.text: Then Aaron’s sons shall burn it on the altar, on top of the burnt offering that is on the wood of the fire, as an offering made by fire, a pleasing aroma to Yahweh.
verses.comment: Retains sacrificial sequence and the phrase 'pleasing aroma' used in other sacrifices.

verses.text: If his offering for a fellowship offering to Yahweh is from the flock, male or female, he must present it without defect.
verses.comment: 'Flock' means sheep or goats. 'Without defect' echoes the requirement for offerings.

verses.text: If he brings a lamb as his offering, he shall present it before Yahweh;
verses.comment: Faithful rendering of sacrificial lamb procedures.

verses.text: He shall lay his hand on the head of his offering and slaughter it before the Tent of Meeting, and Aaron’s sons shall splash its blood all around on the altar.
verses.comment: Repeats the ritual for the different type of animal. 'Tent of Meeting' for the tabernacle.

verses.text: From the fellowship offering, he shall present as an offering made by fire to Yahweh its fat: the complete fat tail, removed close to the backbone, the fat covering the inner parts, and all the fat attached to the organs,
verses.comment: The 'complete fat tail' refers to a special part of sheep sacrifice, per the Hebrew text.

verses.text: the two kidneys with the fat that is on them at the loins, and the long lobe of the liver, which he shall remove with the kidneys.
verses.comment: Repeats verse 4's requirements for sheep as for cattle.

verses.text: The priest shall burn these on the altar as food, an offering made by fire to Yahweh.
verses.comment: 'Food' translates the Hebrew 'lechem', meaning 'bread', but here refers to the 'food' of the offering.

verses.text: If his offering is a goat, he shall present it before Yahweh.
verses.comment: Form matches other types of animals for the offering.

verses.text: He shall lay his hand on its head and slaughter it before the Tent of Meeting, and Aaron’s sons shall splash its blood all around on the altar.
verses.comment: Standard sacrificial sequence is repeated for goats.

verses.text: From it, he shall present as his offering made by fire to Yahweh, the fat covering the inner parts and all the fat attached to the organs,
verses.comment: Faithful rendering of description of what is offered from the goat.

verses.text: the two kidneys with the fat that is on them at the loins, and the long lobe of the liver, which he shall remove with the kidneys.
verses.comment: Repeats anatomical requirements for goats as for other animals.

verses.text: The priest shall burn them on the altar as food, an offering made by fire, a pleasing aroma. All fat is Yahweh's.
verses.comment: 'All fat is Yahweh's' emphasizes the prohibition of eating fat, as the original Hebrew does.

verses.text: This is a lasting statute for your generations wherever you live: You must not eat any fat or any blood.
verses.comment: Direct translation; eating fat and blood is strictly prohibited for all generations.
